document_data.name: Astral Inn
document_data.mainbody: The '''Astral Inn''' was an [[inn]] located in the farming village of [[Elchul]] in [[Halruaa]] during the mid-to-late 14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Activities: The inn served fine wine and great food.
document_data.Defenses: An [[iron golem]] served as the inn's bouncer to dissuade any would-be troublemakers.
